Gulf Oaks RV Park
About Gulf Oaks RV Park
We are a newly-renovated RV Park located on beautiful East Bay. Whether you are here to vacation, here to work, or here to experience the Florida lifestyle for several months, we offer a great location and all the amenities you need!
Local Attractions, Destinations, and Resources
Eat, Shop, Play
Pier 98 Marina - Deep Sea Fishing - .5 miles
Rodeo's Steak Pit & Seafood - .5 miles
Tyndall Air Force Base Visitor's Center - 2.9 miles
Super WalMart on Tyndall Parkway - 3.4 miles
Downtown Panama City Welcome Center - 7 miles
Capt. Anderson's Restaurant - 17 miles
Top Golf
Dolly Parton's Pirate Voyage Dinner & Show
Pier Park - 21 miles
Frank Brown Park - 21 miles
Day Tripping
St. Andrews State Park - 18 miles
Mexico Beach - 17 miles
Port St Joe - 30 miles
Apalachicola - 54 miles
30A (Seaside, Grayton Beach, Rosemary Beach and more) - 40 miles
Tallahassee - 105 miles
Resources
Hospitals
Ascension Sacred Heart Bay - 6 miles
Gulf Coast Regional Medical Center - 9 miles
RV Resources
Camping World - 11 miles
RV Connections - 4.8 miles
Benefits of Gulf Oaks RV Park
24/7 On Site Management
Our newly renovated park has a manager on premises, ensuring you always have our support during your stay.
Long Term Stays
We specialize in long term stays! Whether living the RV/Van Life or in town for contract work at Tyndall, Eastern, or FDOT, our location cannot be beat!
Convenience for Workers
We are conveniently located to
Tyndall Air Force Base (4 Miles)
Eastern Shipbuilding (4 Miles)
DuPont Bridge New Construction Project (1.5 Miles)
Location
What Our Guests Say
We had excellent stay here for a month, great view of East Bay from our lot Row2 Lot 9. Manager was great, laundry room, hookups and cable available...
